Description: Limestone ostracon: on recto and verso respectively ten and four lines of a probably continuous text - phrases from a hymn(?) -written by a grandson of the Scribe of the Tomb Butehamun.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393077) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393077)
